title: 이달의소녀탐구 #454 (LOONA TV #454)
summary:
0:01 -- YeoJin says she will speak less and try to be 'quiet YeoJin'. The PD challenges her.
0:17 -- An hour later, OEC is rehearsing and YeoJin is acting like she is making noise but really isn't.
0:24 -- The PD catches Chuu yawning on camera.
0:31 -- YeoJin + Secret Hertz's rehearsal is about to start and YeoJin is wearing flat heels. Over time, she is becoming noisy again.
0:47 -- YeoJin keeps speaking while her initial promise plays on the side...
YeoJin: "So I ate two bags in a row."; Choerry: "Huh! You'll get fat! But that's okay cause she is cute!"
